{{infobox character | people=[[Gondorians|Gondorian]] | name=Derufin | image=The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game - Derufin.jpg | caption="Derufin" from [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Gondor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Westron]] | birth=Late [[Third Age]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{TA|3019}} | deathlocation=[[Pelennor Fields]] | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage=[[Duinhir]] | siblings=[[Duilin (son of Duinhir)|Duilin]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height=Tall | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons=Bow | steed= }}'''Derufin''' was one of the two tall sons of [[Duinhir]], lord of the [[Blackroot Vale]] at the time of the [[War of the Ring]]. ==History== With five hundred archers of their people, Derufin and his brother [[Duilin (son of Duinhir)|Duilin]] travelled to the aid of [[Minas Tirith]], far to the east of their own lands that lay under the shadow of the [[White Mountains]].{{RK|MT}} There, the brothers fought together in the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]], and both were lost in an assault on the mighty [[Mûmakil]].{{RK|Battle}} ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| | | DNH | | | |DNH=[[Duinhir]]
''fl. {{TA|3019}}''}} {{familytree| |,|-|^|-|.| | |}} {{familytree| DER | | DUI | |DER='''DERUFIN'''
''d. {{TA|3019}}''|DUI=[[Duilin (son of Duinhir)|Duilin]]
''d. {{TA|3019}}''}} {{familytree/end}} ==Portrayal in adaptations== ===Derufin in adaptations=== File:The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game - Derufin.jpg|Derufin from [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]] File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Derufin.jpg|Derufin in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' '''2001-2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]]'':''' :A Decipher card identifies one of the Gondorians of [[Minas Tirith]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' as Derufin. '''2015: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':''' :Derufin and [[Duilin (son of Duinhir)|his brother]] were hunting enthusiasts. The brothers accompanied the player into [[Osgiliath]], and the group succeeded in damaging [[Grond (battering ram)|Grond]] before encountering [[Gothmog (Lieutenant of Morgul)|Gothmog]] and being forced to retreat. Both brothers die during the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]] while leading the mûmakil away from the player. {{references}} [[Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings]] [[Category:Gondorians]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Derufin]] [[fi:Derufin]] [[fr:encyclo:personnages:hommes:3a:dunedain:gondoriens:derufin]]
